long_description: The Thule Crossover 56L wheeled duffel is the ideal wide-mouth gear bag-it easily loads helmets, boots, gloves, clothing and other gear essentials. Durable exoskeleton and molded polypropylene back panel absorb the impact of rugged travel. Tough, oversize wheels and durable Thule V-Tubing(TM) telescoping handles guarantee a smooth, steady and straight pull for years to come. Compression straps customize the Thule Crossover 56L duffle to the size of your load. Heat-molded, crushproof SafeZone compartment protects eyewear, portable electronics and other fragile items; compartment locks and can be removed for extra room. Divided main compartment separates clean from dirty, wet from dry, and work from play. Aluminum hardwear and water-resistant fabrics combine to create a lightweight, durable bag.
short_description: The Thule Crossover 56L wheeled duffel is the ideal wide-mouth gear bag-it easily loads helmets, boots, gloves, clothing and other gear essentials.
